level.heading: Transition provisions.
level.text: All employees of the Legal Aid Agency for the District of Columbia on the date of enactment of this chapter shall be deemed to be employees of the Service and shall be entitled to the same compensation and benefits as they are entitled to as employees of the Legal Aid Agency for the District of Columbia.

level.heading: History
level.text: (July 29, 1970, Pub. L. 91-358, title III, ยง 308.)

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Education Licensure Commission, powers and duties, see ยง 38-1307.
